author: Slidebean
description:
Why AI reasoning is becoming a line item on your budget.

OpenAI’s latest model introduces pricing tied to internal reasoning time, offering different modes for speed versus deliberation.

While the approach improves performance on complex tasks, it also forces teams to rethink cost management beyond simple token counts.

As organizations adopt routing strategies and track cost per task, a new reality emerges:
AI intelligence is no longer flat priced, it’s metered by how deeply the model thinks.

👉 Visit our YouTube channel for more content.
title: OpenAI just launched a model that charges more when it thinks harder.
